description: Not everyone needs or prefers mid-height hikers. The Bridger Low provides all the technology and construction of Oboz's flagship hiker, but in a lower package. You get the same great comfort, TPU chassis support, and B-DRY waterproof technology - just don’t step in a deeper puddle.
name: Oboz Bridger Low B-Dry, Wide - Mens

specs.value: Waterproof Nubuck Leather + Abrasion-resistant Mesh, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, Molded rubber toe cap & heel counter
Single Density Compression Molded EVA, TPU Chassis, Nylon Shank
